website_summaries.verdict: Epson's top buy if you are looking for a portable model, but be aware of the reported issues and costly operation.
pros: A portable yet powerful little printer – prints fast and quiet, and produces vivid colors
Lithium-ion battery is easy to charge with USB or AC adapter
cons: The small screen is difficult to read, and the ink head has the tendency to clog

customer_reviews.title: Not for Occasional Use
customer_reviews.text: This printer is a great idea - small, rechargeable battery, quiet, and fast. However, Epson's use of "precision" print heads means that you'll ultimately end up clogging them if you neglect to use your printer for a couple of weeks. If you're lucky, you can dump half a new ink cartridge into a cleaning cycle and the printer works again. However, if you're like me, the self-cleaning won't work and, if you're out of warranty, you've got a $200 paper-weight. This is especially true if you use the printer in an area that's either very dry or very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Ty A

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I get about two pages printed then problems. The ink nozzle gets clogged easily and then prints messy. My only guess is storing in briefcase causes the problem. The printer will automatically clean the nozzle but waste ink and time doing so ( Can you imagine on the road then the printer stops for maintenance). Then your maintenance box will need replacement. WiFi is a hit or miss so I you start with cable connection to make it connect property each time. Bottom line you will spend lots of time and money getting this to print properly on the road. My dissatisfaction is so high I will not use it anymore even after replacing the ink and maintenance box.
customer_reviews.author: Gator

customer_reviews.title: Not Cool
customer_reviews.text: This printer let me down. I like the size and the fact that it's portable but it has never printed correctly. It always prints lines in solid colors. I tried a cleaning cycle and that used up ink with no improvement. Finally, tonight it wouldn't print a simple b/w page of text that I need for an early job tomorrow. It says I need to replace the ink cartridges after printing maybe 20 mostly b/w prints total since I bought it. Now, sometime before 8am when I'm due to arrive the job, I have to find a Kinkos to print a single page of b/w text.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Haut

customer_reviews.title: Works just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Goes though a lot of ink and still don't get this ink box consumable piece. Can't get Wi-Fi to work no matter what I do so restricted to USB hardwire. One nice feature is the s/w preview (once enabled). It shows what is going to get printed, allowing me to abort without wasting paper and ink if I'm not going to get what I thought I was.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working and can't get support.
customer_reviews.text: Has not worked for over a few weeks despite numerous attempts to find the problem It said I need to replace ink cartridges and when I did it said it didn't work with reburnished ink cartridges. I ordered replacement cartridges direct from Epson and STILL doesn't work. The printer keeps telling me to replace the ink cartridge. I have updated all software. I have disconnected and reconnected and still the problem persists. Now I find the item is discontinued. In less than a year. I bought this directly from Amazon. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: SparkleMom

customer_reviews.title: best printer for my carry-on
customer_reviews.text: Love this printer. I also have a travel printer from a different company. The other one stays home now, and this is my travel companion. Pros: This printer closes up fairly snug, without any edges to get caught on things in my bag. The screen is nice for programming the printer. I hook it to my hotspot and print wirelessly that way. Cons: I would like a snugger latch on the closure. And it would be great if they could get the same print quality with less weight. Also, a bluetooth option would be nice. Overall I like this printer and would buy it again or recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Wireless not for mobile use.
customer_reviews.text: We are RVERS who spend about half the year on the road. Bought this printer to take along. Use it rarely. Has worked fine except for one thing. Most every campground has some form of wifi, mostly pretty poor. The setup to use this printer wirelessly will drive you to drink if every wifi is different. Only way we can use it is with usb hokum and our Samsung tablet has no usb port. Finally bought a regular laptop to take and works fine .
customer_reviews.author: Barbell

customer_reviews.title: Works okay but doesn't work great with MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: This printer is handy to have on trips, but it has constant problems connecting to a MacBook Pro. Each time you want to use it, you must go through and manually re-add the printer over and over again. This gets a bit annoying when you are printing several things. Seems like a software update would have fixed this issue months ago.
customer_reviews.author: jamosc

customer_reviews.title: Fab mobile printer
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with my purchase. The printer is light, was easy to set up, I can print in Starbucks and even in my car! As long as the Wi-Fi gets there. The only concern I have now is the ink, hope it last because the cartridges are mini mini. Update:September 2019. Still running great. Cartridges last as well as others I use in other machines. Someone mentioned heads get clogged if you live in a warm place. Not the case for me I live in Calexico, California, we get up to 112F on summer and no clogs issue. When I don't use the print for a couple of weeks I run the maintenance cleaning and everything runs fine.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Soria

customer_reviews.title: print to go go
customer_reviews.text: Since having to downsize this has become my go-to printer. I usually use digital media and documents and just share them, but when I need printed documents or want to recycle some paper this device is wonderful. Print from a phone or tablet from cloud storage and you have a whole office on the go using tools like Google's Docs, Sheets, and Slides.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: The Handy, Dandiest Printer to have on the road
customer_reviews.text: I was writing a speech, the first major speech I've ever done. I had no idea how much editing I would do between the time I left Florida for Cleveland and the time I got up on the platform and delivered my half hour life story. Endless drafts and changes as I revised my garbled text to flowing prose. My Buddy (Epson WF-100, pun intended) was with me the whole way. Print crisp and clear both black and color. Speedy and reliable. Big success. Thank you, Epson for manufacturing this printer, and Amazon for selling it.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene Skeen

customer_reviews.title: If You Work While Traveling
customer_reviews.text: I run my own business and orders don't ship themsevles. This printer is light weight, the printer did a excellent job on printing the shipping labels. Now I don't have to ask anyone to ship my orders for me and worry if they are going to get it done, I can take some units with me and ship them myself!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRINTER IS THE WORST
customer_reviews.text: I am going to toss it in the trash, and go to a local UPS store to print. Epson should be ashamed for putting this out.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Collum

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Easy To Assemble, High Quality Printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer is designed well and is durable. It comes with specific ink pots that aren't very expensive. It's stingy with ink, so you get a lot of pages out of a combo set. When traveling in high heat (100+), the ink my dry, so you have to clean the printheads. Afterwards, this printer continues to present the quality you designed into your document. It's easy to program and maintain. If you've worked with Epson printers, this will be a welcome, useful addition to your office.
customer_reviews.author: QucikSethisUp!

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use! Easy set up. I tried it out using my e-mail, cell phone, lap top and my tablet. All worked with no problem. We have always loved Epson products. I've never had a problem with their printers. This is going to be so useful in my home. Portable for every room I work in. Thank you Epson for another great product!
customer_reviews.author: geri 74

customer_reviews.title: An average performer
customer_reviews.text: Prints great black-and-white, terrible color. The initial price is too high and the ink cartridges are expensive and run out quickly. On the upside it's convenient to carry in hand baggage and with a bit of persuading it will connect wirelessly to your laptop. If all you need is word documents printed while you're on the road, it works well; but don't expect sparkling color presentations or photos.
customer_reviews.author: Scot Wha's Away

customer_reviews.title: Like another reviewer wrote, “$200 paper weight”
customer_reviews.text: Trash. I purchased this at the start of 2017 and it’s already garbage. I followed all care instructions to the t. I told good care of this and didn’t overwork it. Never purchasing epson again after dealing with their “customer service department”.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money if it only works for less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one of these printers I have purchased. 1st on lasted many years and still worked when I replaced it but was starting to not hold charge anymore. New one well got 5 months out of it and won’t connect via WiFi anymore. Tech support is worthless and to late to send back so just money down the toilet and replace with a hp. Too bad I really liked my first one and was hoping to get same results with second one I owned.
customer_reviews.author: Oh no not that guy!

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile printer
customer_reviews.text: Great little printer. Have been using this in my truck for printing siding estimates. I just beam it from my tablet to the printer. It is going on 4 years old now. I bought a new one as back up. This thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ledge

customer_reviews.title: Mobility
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect for me. Battery holds up well. I use it on two different laptops. one for work and one for home. I bought a case for it here on Amazon for protection when out and about. Very dependable so far and I am pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Nelson

customer_reviews.title: OK printer, for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I tolerate this printer because I live in a very small studio apartment with limited space, cord, and power access. If you don't use it frequently, expect the quality to be so low that you must reprint things. If I had more space however I would definitely not be using this printer anymore.
customer_reviews.author: GM15

customer_reviews.title: The print quality is not fantastic compared to actual home office printers but it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The print quality is not fantastic compared to actual home office printers but it is so lightweight and convenient to use that it makes it worth the purchase. I feel like even on draft print, it does still use a lot of ink though so we are constantly replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: KirstRob

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: It prints ok but the problem is the consumption of ink. Cartridges are too expensive and they last shortly. Do not recommend this product. Better find other one than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Qiqe A

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this printer!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compatibility issues. Nightly calls to tech support. Constant need to re-install software. I hope it is not too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Mechanical failure
customer_reviews.text: I used the printer for about one month after purchasing it. Put it away for about 13 months. When I need it again for travel, it would not work properly. Epson told me that is was a mechanical problem, but since it was out of warranty they could do nothing. So it worked okay for about one month and then broke down. This is horrendous quality and worse customer service. Going back to HP!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.text: Had nothing but trouble with this printer. Bought this to replace an old HP portable printer that was 5 years old. It seems that if you don't constantly use it you have to clean the heads over and over again. I had to send it back to Epson for replacement and even that one had issues with it. I ended up giving it away to someone after warning them about all the issues. Very disappointing. NOT RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: the WF-100 works perfectly right out of the box! The print is absolute beautiful clear and crisp. The colors are very vivid and clean. The unit can sit on a small dais and not be noticeable. Better printing than I can get form my big HP!!!! no noise either. Great little unit. I have highly recommended this unit to members of my staff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and portable
customer_reviews.text: Love this little pack of printer! It holds 5 pages at a time, but prints well! Portable and I can put it away after I print something.
customer_reviews.author: John & Barbara Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Epson WF 100 -- Utter Failue
customer_reviews.text: Surprised with Epson for this utter failure--never-ready, unresponsive, crooked-paper-feeding ink-guzzler. Loyal Epson customer for decades, until 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Radiogirl

customer_reviews.title: Ink Hog
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but it is a black ink hog and the cartridges are $23.00 each. Luckily it has not failed me yet for professional use (printing out insurance policies on the spot) but every time I try to use it casually for printing outlines for my great nephew to color it decides it wants to get out of alignment. Each time you straighten it out it uses a bunch of ink to "clean" the jets and your pocketbook. If it operated consistent and did not suck ink I would have given it two more stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michaellrar

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile printer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Oct 2015. Nearly 4 years old now and still works great. Time consuming to manually configure WIFI and battery is built in and can't be replaced. Those are the only two negatives. Replace maintenance box & ink cartridges & keep it charged up & it keeps on printing great. It goes in my laptop bag on the plane or on road trips. When this one finally dies I'll probably get the same one again. Overall good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Epson portable printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer does exactly what was described in the Amazon blurb. It folds up quite nicely and is easy to carry. It has a built in battery so it does not need to be plugged in during printing. The quality of the printing is excellent for B&W as well as color. There is a small LED screen to view toner levels etc. It is OK for setting options.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo H. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Small & Portable
customer_reviews.text: Great little printer, works both wired (micro usb) and wireless. Print quality very good for such a small printer. Set up was quick and easy and worked well both new and older computers. My only criticism is the extremely short micro usb cord.
customer_reviews.author: lladnar

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry Very confusing when setting up the wireless ...
customer_reviews.text: easy to carry Very confusing when setting up the wireless connection, I have 3 drivers installed, sometimes they don't work... The printer definitely needs to be cleaned and adjust after every trip, I carried it in my luggage and when I took them out again, the ink jet head needed to be cleaned through its program since it printed lines on paper. Ink is used up quickly than I expected, but for a portable printer, really didn't expect to print a lot on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: Great little printer, great for travel, as it is very small. Recommend getting the ink maintenance tray as a spare. Ink lasts well.
customer_reviews.author: Anne E. Servello

customer_reviews.title: Upgrading to Five Starts after Owning for a While
customer_reviews.text: I have to upgrade my review after owning this printer, trouble free for a few years now. My original complaint was about the menu selection not coming up "just ready to print". Honestly, I just got this out of the trunk and loaded the driver (easy to find) on the website and it worked perfectly to print 60 pages without a jam or other issue.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice When Portability Is Needed
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have a portable printer, and it's great in a pinch. Not terribly cost effective for daily printing, but I've been glad to have it with me in remote locations.
customer_reviews.author: GoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!! Easy Setup!
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars! I have always been impressed with the quality of Epson products. This is compact and lightweight. Setup was simple. Only about 5 minutes of downloading the driver then putting in the network password. Easy stuff. I like how the paper tray folds over and forms a cover for buttons and screen so it doesn't get damaged. Print quality is good and fast. I use this to print on mailing labels. The printer had no problem accepting and printing on the Avery label paper. I am glad I spent the extra money for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable for occasional use and ends up being extremely expensive
customer_reviews.text: Agreed with the customer reviews that this printer is not well suited for occasional use. Print head would routinely clog and I went through an entire maintenance cartridge and was unable to get the printer to print. Once the maintenance cartridge was used up, the printer would no longer function until replaced with a new maintenance cartridge, which I did not have on hand. So the printer left me in a bind. Disastrous waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: H M

customer_reviews.title: Very compact and convenient printer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this little printer! The size and convenience was well worth the purchase. I can just take it out of it's bag, turn it on, and print from all of my devices and computer! I don't have to plug anything in.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Love this printer
customer_reviews.text: Love this printer. I travel significantly, run a family business and homeschool three older kids. This printer is my sanity. Extremely easy to use. Normally frustrating printer tasks are simple. Works like a gem. I ordered a case and that makes it a bit bulky but it is completely worth it. I would leave my suitcase behind first. For anyone who has to maintain life on the go and requires significant printing capabilities - this is the only one i would recommend for the price after researching in stores and online.I have had it for about six months and absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Great printer. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great printer. Very easy to use, excellent print quality. The only issue is the leveling tool. It seems to become unlevel after it has just told you it was level. Other than that it is great product.
customer_reviews.author: kdhawke

customer_reviews.title: Amazing powerful portable color printer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing powerful portable color printer. Took it to a conference shortly after I purchased it. We went through over 1200 sheets of paper, 6 color cartridges, 4 black cartridges printing color reports that participants bought from us. Worked flawlessly! Super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: N. Monson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful printer. I use this for work and in ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful printer. I use this for work and in my RV when I am out and about. It works like a charm with no issues. The only small draw back is the amount of paper which can be placed in the feeder...I wish it was a bit more but for the size and convenience, I’ll deal with it!
customer_reviews.author: baker126

customer_reviews.title: Don't print in true black
customer_reviews.text: This model uses a bit of color ink in every gray scale print, so you can never have a true b&w print. If your color ink is out and you have black ink, you can't print in black! It's small and portable so I would only recommend it for a college student to print drafts of their comp papers as this will not work for designers.
customer_reviews.author: Jane House

customer_reviews.title: SO UPSET horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable the maintenance box is a obviously a problem. I am not sure why EPSON is not resolving the issue but this is ridiculous. SO UPSET horrible customer service! The printer tells me to replace the maintenance box so I follow the instructions and BUY a new maintenance box and the error code is still there and the printer doesn't work $200 wasted for a $5 part RIDICULOUS Call customer service and they are USELESS they offer to tell me where I can take it and PAY to have it fixed. Are you kidding me this obviously a large scale issue shame on you for not taking care of your customers
customer_reviews.author: A. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my rv printer
customer_reviews.text: this setup very easy. just follow the directions. I did not have a dvd player in my tablet so downloading the program was the way to do it. 10 minute setup. time will tell about longevity and print head drying and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and set up, it’s the lightest portable printer I have had so far. Haven’t had to use the tech support, but gave it 5 stars anyway.. I would suggest to buy more ink, the ones from the factory don’t last as long as the ink you buy from somewhere else..
customer_reviews.author: Cukkel

customer_reviews.title: its like the ink would not disburse when hit printing on ...
customer_reviews.text: the printer we had to wait to hand out to a new tech and when we started to use this printer the ink would not work . its like the ink would not disburse when hit printing on the machine. And I am being told we cant send back to get a warranty and or exchange. Not happy being this was a an $ 199.99 machine. not cheap
customer_reviews.author: Tracy D.

customer_reviews.title: Always getting stucked. Paper jam 99% of the time ...
customer_reviews.text: Always getting stucked. Paper jam 99% of the time. F.U. Epson you've been making printers for decades but your company still haven't managed to avoid paper jams.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This printer is amazing so far , my husband needed it to print paper work out while he is on the road . It was very easy to set up and connect it to the wifi and my husband's phone. The printing quality is great. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: It's super easy to set up has not jammed once
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest printer I have ever had to date. It's super easy to set up has not jammed once, Those with kids keep this for that home work they can't do because their printer out of ink or does not work it's small and easy to print and go.
customer_reviews.author: Andy's Fix it dot com

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes when it is plugged in the usb of the car and you start the engine it starts to doesn't charge and doesn't work at all. Then you wait for about 2 weeks without using it and starts working again. The worst printer ever. The customer service is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA DELGADO

customer_reviews.title: Research for purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Would not load paper. Made a lot of clicking noises but didn't do anything. Finally I took it to a repair shop and they couldn't get it to load the paper either
customer_reviews.author: Techfan

customer_reviews.title: This Printer is a Piece of Trash.  DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Printer will no longer power on or charge after light usage. I've had this about three months, and have not even used it enough to make a dent in the starter ink cartridge. I've printed MAYBE twenty pages, and now it won't charge through the adapter or USB. The charge light no longer comes on when it's plugged in. This printer was, in my opinion, quite expensive, and I'd already invested in replacement ink. I wasted AT LEAST $400 on this thing, more if you count shipping, and now all I have is an ugly paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: CJS

customer_reviews.title: Good portable printer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this printer for its size. It functions as expected and did well at printing 1000+ pages of documents when I was working from home one month. I would recommend having a couple of the maintenance boxes on hand as it will not print once it decides it is time to replace the maintenance box. I live in Dallas and couldn't find the maintenance boxes anywhere so I had to order from Epson's website.
customer_reviews.author: AbbeyRoad

customer_reviews.title: Constant Problems
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this printer. Constant "ink cartridge" errors that cause you to NOT be able to print. For instance, printer constantly says "replace color ink". After I do (with EPSON BRAND), it continues to tell me to replace the color ink, and won't even allow me to print in black.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Willet

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. losing wifi signal, slow and died after 6 months. Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Guy Lugassy

customer_reviews.title: Nice printer
customer_reviews.text: We like this printer. My daughter uses it more for school. I will have to buy one for myself, since she will have worn it out by the time she graduates. I do wish it has a scan option. That would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jsartin

customer_reviews.title: Won't Print when color ink is low even though black ink is full
customer_reviews.text: I think its a way to get people to continue buying color ink - $$$ It wont let me print in black even though my black in k is full, because my color ink is empty. Also, big problem for me because i NEVER print in color, why is all my color gone, when i rarely print in color and usually always in black. Epson seems to be scamming.
customer_reviews.author: Casey J. Roth

customer_reviews.title: MY DISLIKES
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good printer but 3 things I really hate is that it doesn’t hold a lot of paper the WiFi always disconnect when it’s not in use. After a Day of not using it I always have to reconnect it manually and it also takes super long to connect Ink always runs out super fast I would definitely want to do a return on it
customer_reviews.author: SAUCE

customer_reviews.title: Buy backup cartridges.
customer_reviews.text: Really convenient to take with you on the go. As for performance this printer. Short! I haven't been able to use this for more than one day without replacing the darn cartridges! Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sejkora

customer_reviews.title: Great portable printer.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with battery. Print quality is quite good. Small and light. I've looked for a nice portable color printer for a while, after my old HP 310 (parallel port....) just got too old and cranky. This was a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ink cartridge drain ultra fast like 10 or 15 papers and its all gone
customer_reviews.author: nandobyker

customer_reviews.title: Best portable
customer_reviews.text: Had a month long trip to Europe and needed the ability to print documents while abroad. Besides being rather compact (fit in my carry on without difficulty) this baby was a real workhorse. I didn't use wireless, but plugged right in to my Surface and after downloading the free drivers from Epson performed beautifully the entire trip with perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Trash!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend anyone to buy this trash. The printer could not connect to the computer by usb cable. The WIFI could not detect the computer. In addition, the software will not download until usb connection is made.... Buy at your own risk......it is only money!! My purchase was deposited in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Terjandro

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, Reliable but uses a lot of ink
customer_reviews.text: In addition to using a lot of ink you also have to replace the maint card often. It does work for a mobile printer though.
customer_reviews.author: Itsallweird

customer_reviews.title: Super little printer
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my mobile office. It's so easy to use on the go and was a really affordable price. I do wish it could scan as well but having a printer small enough to leave in my car and use whenever I need it has been super convenient. Get a bag to carry it with all the cords and extra cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Purple_D

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ. Nibble travel extremely well and works on wifi, cellphone hotspot. I'll buy it again 100 times.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great printer, portable, only use it wired.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I need, but could only connect via USB cable. Worked to establish WiFi connection, but no luck. I'm pretty tech-savvy so it's not that. I haven't tried Bluetooth connection. I really don't need either wireless connection as I will generally use this on a temporary desk wired to my laptop and that works fine. Nice print quality, VERY portable. Internal battery enabled me to continue work during a power failure (using for emergency services applications so this is critical!)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good printer
customer_reviews.text: The little printer is fairly quick and the quality is good. It is light weight so it’s easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for portability
customer_reviews.text: If you need a quality portable printer, this is the one. I have had it for a while and have had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Man

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this printer
customer_reviews.text: Ink cartridge life of this printer is too short. I have used it several times only to print 2-3 pages (20 pages max in total). After the cartridge replacement it simply stopped working. I don't recommend this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay Shtin

customer_reviews.title: Good portable printer
customer_reviews.text: Good portable printer, a little slower than the Canon (which I used for 5 years) but much lighter and charges up much faster. Good print quality.
customer_reviews.author: tonersdt

customer_reviews.title: Portable Printer
customer_reviews.text: This WF100 is great for the car. Has an internal battery which is good for about 3 pages, then time to plug into source. Wireless to laptop - nice color print quality known by Epson. Easy setup -
customer_reviews.author: PENMEISTER

customer_reviews.title: small size, but great result
customer_reviews.text: I like its "pocket" size (it's not that small of course, but once closed it is really small) and light weight, perfect for travel. It was easy to set up and have it running. Printing quality is really good, would buy it again any time.
customer_reviews.author: EyanB

customer_reviews.title: Battery and ink don't last long.
customer_reviews.text: First, I want to say this thing is super light weight and easily portable. I am in sales and use it about 3 times per day to print 3 to 6 pieces of paper total per day. I can get maybe 3.5 days out of this before it needs to be charged. The ink doesn't last long either. My old HP portable printers batter would last a month, easily.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett Brown

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Fits well in my mobile office Samsonite bag. I use it infrequently, but I have not had any issues. It prints faster when it's connected to the AC adapter and outlet, but the battery-operated option can be more convenient if you're not near a power source.
customer_reviews.author: honestreviews

customer_reviews.title: Nice lit PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: I like this little printer, exactly what I expected, quite user friendly and has been totally dependable. I have NOT used the wifi function yet as it comes with connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this to anyone who needs document to printout on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the printer, how portable they are. Highly recommend this to anyone who needs document to printout on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Euna J

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Totally recommend to spend money on this ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need for my business, print anything I want anywhere I want, all you need is printer and paper and your cellphone or tablet. Love it. Totally recommend to spend money on this one printer.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Broke after second time using; contacted tech support and that was a joke
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: One Great portable Printer
customer_reviews.text: Great little printer for people on the move. We purchased it for our RV due in large part to its size and print quality. I like the battery for times when I just need to get a quick print and it has couple of charging options USB and wall charger.. I printed a couple of 4X6 color prints WOW. Epson got it right when it added (Direct Wi-Fi ), so you don't need a network to print from you computer big ++
customer_reviews.author: SharpSeaz

customer_reviews.title: High ink use
customer_reviews.text: Nice, small printer but the nozzles clog often and you need to run cleaning. Wastes too much ink and fills up the maintenance box.
customer_reviews.author: B. K. Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: but the set up software is horrible. It does not work
customer_reviews.text: I gave one star because it is small and compact, but the set up software is horrible. It does not work! The WiFi-Direct does not work! It works well from the USB cable, but that's not why I purchased it. I also purchased the EPSPON DS-30 which scans well, but the software also is not great. If there is a way to scan multiple pages to one PDF file I can't figure it out. The HP Deskjet software is much more practical, useful, and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A Phares

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the WF-100 on two of my Laptops. The installation with the DVD on a Windows 8.1 system went very smooth, both with the USB connected and than switched to WiFy using the printer as a hub. When I installed the same software on my Windows 7 Laptop, the USB connection worked great, when I switched to WiFy, not so good. I had to download a new driver from Epson for the windows 7. After that the WiFy connection worked great. The print quality is very good for documents. Have not printed any pictures.
customer_reviews.author: crewchief

customer_reviews.title: When she first saw the unit she begun to like it and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mobile printer for my wife use because she used to transact in public place as insurance agent where you don't need to look for netshop or any printing services. When she first saw the unit she begun to like it and easy to operate. The printing is vivid and excellent. The unit arrived perfectly. I gave 5 stars on it...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It's barely a year old!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit in August of last year and the color heads have already stopped working. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Kiedra Taylor

customer_reviews.title: love this.
customer_reviews.text: love this... I work from home and meet clients at different locations. This printer fits right in my briefcase works on Bluetooth very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katina Angelis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRINTER! Its not as fast as a home ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had it now for a few months, GREAT PRINTER! Its not as fast as a home printer but very close and faster than some I have seen. I have dropped this printer, beat it up in freezing cold and hot temps in my work truck, it is a tough damn printer. Here is the rub, GOOD LUCK FINDING INK CARTRIDGES AND THE LITTLE MAINTENANCE BOX (holds the wasted ink) you have to get them from Epson, sometimes on Amazon but never in a store or office place. I recommended this printer highly and getting the ink from Epson is not so bad.
customer_reviews.author: A Sloth

customer_reviews.title: Small but efficient and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: This is far beyond my expectation, all my friends can print to it from a variety of devices with beautiful print. The battery holds a good charge. Small but powerful! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: di

customer_reviews.title: I love this printer light weight and very easy to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer light weight and very easy to use everywhere you go. easy to download and work from tablet, laptop and even my cell phone. Best ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: worked fine in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: Dear Epson, The printer worked fine in the beginning but after using it for about a month it stopped working properly. the Printer eats the paper and it does not print well anymore. Can you please contact me to solve the problem?
customer_reviews.author: M-M

customer_reviews.title: I needed a wireless (but not like, AA battery operated) wifi enabled printer that has ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wireless (but not like, AA battery operated) wifi enabled printer that has an attractive, low profile when not in use. This is it. It just works on my ipad, iphone and the boyfriend's macbook pro. you need to install a driver for it, but printing from a surface book and regular desktop pc was a breeze as well. only annoyance is typing the little wifi password with arrow keys, but you don't need to do it very often at all.
customer_reviews.author: Britney W.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT high quality durable printer
customer_reviews.text: I need to take a printer into my job sites. This one travels very well in my case and provides perfect printing each time.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Best printer for being on the go! Being a legal process server I have to print documents all the time and in a short notice -this has been a time and gas saver since I can print where ever I’m at and not have to rush to an office or print store.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Compact and basic
customer_reviews.text: No bells and whistles, but it doesn't weight 20lbs and take up an entire shelf. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Teachman

customer_reviews.title: Works great love it it printed from my phone like a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great love it it printed from my phone like a charm I am so glad I invested in buying this printer
customer_reviews.author: S Jones

customer_reviews.title: after a month it started to give out on me ...
customer_reviews.text: after a month it started to give out on me. tried everything, only used genuine epson ink, now i have a dead printer...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I have 2!
customer_reviews.text: So convenient and takes up no space on my desk. I dont print a lot of pages but it's perfect for light printing!
customer_reviews.author: CKM

product_meta.title: Epson Workforce WF-100 Wireless Mobile Printer, Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
product_meta.description: Style:PrinterThe world's lightest and smallest mobile printer. This wireless printer easily prints from tablets, smartphones and computers. Built-in battery, Rechargeable by USB or AC adapter. this Epson printer is designed for use with only genuine Epson-brand cartridges. Other brands of ink cartridges and ink supplies are not compatible and, even if described as Compatible, may not function properly or at all. Epson provides information about the design of the printer on the box and in many other locations and materials Included with the printer and on the website. epson periodically provides firmware updates to address issues of security, performance, minor bug fixes and ensure the printer functions as designed. This printer was designed to work only with genuine Epson ink cartridges and some updates may affect the functionality of third party ink. Non-epson branded or Altered Epson cartridges that functioned prior to a firmware update may not continue to function.
feature_bullets: This printer is designed for use with Epson cartridges only, not third party cartridges or ink; Cartridges described as Compatible, Remanufactured, refilled or refillable may not work properly or at all; See product description for more details
World's lightest and smallest mobile printer
Print from iPad, iPhone, tablets and smartphones

Built in, rechargeable lithium ion battery. Operating Systems-Windows 8.x (32-bit, 64-bit), Windows 7 (32-bit, 64-bit), Windows Vista (32-bit, 64-bit), Windows XP SP3 (32-bit), Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, Mac OS X 10.6 - 10.10.x5
Easy battery charging via USB or AC adapter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars670 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
